fastload.button.debug.tooltip: As depurações devem ser impressas nos logs?
fastload.button.instant_load.tooltip: Are you impatient? Do you hate loading screens? Just switch it on, load a world, and you will regret it. -_-
fastload.button.local_render_chunk_radiu: Radius for how many chunks in a circle should render in Fastload's Building Terrain for Singleplayer.
fastload.button.server_render_chunk_radi: Radius for how many chunks in a circle should render in Fastload's Building Terrain for Servers.
fastload.button.chunk_try_limit.tooltip: Quantas vezes a mesma contagem de blocos poderia ser retornada seguidas antes de abandonar a pré-renderização
